content: Riverbank Station RBC-12 offline Mar 2-5 for turbine inspection. Expect 3% supply reduction.
Wind farm GWF-19 partial shutdown for blade checks on 20 turbines. Forecasted output drop 25%.
metadata: Maintenance window: Q2 2025, exact dates TBA

content: Scheduled line outage on T-Line-88 for re-conductoring. 2-day interruption, re-route power through alt lines.
metadata: Dates: Apr 10-11, 2025, affects East to Central power flow

content: West District substation Sub-A11 maintenance. Early morning downtime to minimize impact.
Coal station VCP-55 shutting down 1 unit for emissions retrofit. 2-month partial capacity.
metadata: Unit #2 offline: May-Jun 2025, region: South District
